assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: MHM Automation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs and delivers systems for the food processing sectors in New Zealand and Australia. It operates through Automation, Fabrication, and Mercer Technologies segments. The company offers 3D de-palletizing, acid tanks, architectural features, automated storage shuttle systems, autonomous mobile robots, bandsaws, betatest leak detectors, betaturn block turner, betavac vacuum packers, boilers and heat plants, bulk storage silos, carton erectors, carton ladders and closers, cheese cooling tunnels, chipping systems, collaborative robots, cooking vessels, cranes and lifting systems, debarking systems, dished and flanged heads, elevators and conveyors, plate freezers, finger jointers, gantry palletiser and de-palletisers, and grain dryers and silos. It also provides grain stackers, gravity fed box cutters, guarding, hide processors, robotic box cutters, log processing equipment, meat compactors, mechanical de-baggers, mechanical de-boxers, micro dosing, mild steel fabrication, mould and defect detection units, moulders, chilling and freezing tunnels, plywood processing, powder bins and hoppers, pressure vacuum valves, road and rail tanks, robotic de-baggers, simplified palletizing, screen cleaners, screening solutions, spiral freezers and chillers, stainless benching, stainless silos and tanks, stainless steel fabrication, timber storage and stackings, tube fillings, robotic box cutters, timber processing, weigh inline scale and labelers, wine and beer tanks, and spare parts and services. The company offers its products under the AiCo, BetaVac, H&C, Milmeq, Mercer, MHM, PV-Valve, SCE, Scotts, and Vekos brands. It serves agriculture and fertilizer, antarctica, dairy, food processing, horticulture, industrial, logistics, meat, and timber and sawmilling industries. The company was formerly known as Mercer Group Limited. MHM Automation Limited was founded in 1884 and is headquartered in Christchurch, New Zealand.
